verses.verse: And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H362>Elim<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin<s%>, which is between <S%H362>Elim<s%> and <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after their departing <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>:

and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4310>them<s%>, Would that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, when we <S%H3427>sat<s%> by <S%H1320>the<s%> <S%H5518>flesh-pots<s%>, when we did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full<s%>; for ye have brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> into this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, to <S%H4191>kill<s%> this whole <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H4305>Behold<s%>, I will rain <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H5971>you<s%>; and the people shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H3950>gather<s%> a <S%H1697>day<s%>'s portion every <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I may <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3212>them<s%>, whether they will walk in my <S%H8451>law<s%>, or not.

And it shall come to pass on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that they shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> they bring <S%H935>in<s%>, and it shall be <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much as they <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, At <S%H6153>even<s%>, then ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, then ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for that he <S%H8085>heareth<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and what are <S%H5168>we<s%>, that ye murmur against <S%H3885>us<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This shall <S%H3068>be<s%>, when Jehovah shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7646>full<s%>; for that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> which ye <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H5168>him<s%>: and what are we? your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> are not against <S%H3068>us<s%>, but against Jehovah.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%>.

And it came to <S%H175>pass<s%>, as Aaron <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H3519>and<s%>, behold, the glory of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, At <S%H996>even<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> ye shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it came to pass at <S%H6153>even<s%>, that the <S%H7958>quails<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H7902>lay<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And when the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that <S%H7902>lay<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, <S%H6440>behold<s%>, upon the face of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H1851>small<s%> round <S%H2636>thing<s%>, <S%H1851>small<s%> as the <S%H3713>hoar-frost<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>, they said <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, What is <S%H4478>it<s%>? for they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not what it <S%H4872>was<s%>. And Moses <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3899>them<s%>, It is the bread which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you to <S%H402>eat<s%>.

This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>. <S%H3950>Gather<s%> ye of it every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating<s%>; an <S%H6016>omer<s%> a <S%H1538>head<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H5315>persons<s%>, shall ye <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H376>it<s%>, every man for them that are in his <S%H168>tent<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3950>so<s%>, and gathered some <S%H7235>more<s%>, some <S%H4591>less<s%>.

And when they <S%H4058>measured<s%> it with an <S%H6016>omer<s%>, he that gathered <S%H7235>much<s%> had nothing <S%H5736>over<s%>, and he that gathered <S%H4591>little<s%> had no <S%H2637>lack<s%>; they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, Let no man <S%H3498>leave<s%> of it till the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

Notwithstanding they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; but <S%H582>some<s%> of them <S%H3498>left<s%> of it until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and it <S%H7311>bred<s%> <S%H8438>worms<s%>, and became <S%H887>foul<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was wroth with <S%H7107>them<s%>.

And they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it morning by <S%H1242>morning<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating<s%>: and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> waxed <S%H2552>hot<s%>, it <S%H4549>melted<s%>.

And it came to <S%H8345>pass<s%>, that on the sixth <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6016>omers<s%> for each <S%H259>one<s%>: and all the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, This is that which Jehovah hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H4279>To-morrow<s%> is a solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>, a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H644>bake<s%> that which ye will <S%H644>bake<s%>, and <S%H1310>boil<s%> that which ye will <S%H1310>boil<s%>; and all <S%H3605>that<s%> remaineth <S%H5736>over<s%> lay <S%H3240>up<s%> for you to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
And they laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> till the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>bade<s%>: and it did not become <S%H887>foul<s%>, neither was there any worm <S%H7415>therein<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H398>Eat<s%> that <S%H3117>to-day<s%>; for <S%H3117>to-day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3117>to-day<s%> ye shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H7637>it<s%>; but on the seventh <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, in it there shall be none.
And it came to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that there went <S%H3318>out<s%> some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%>, and they found <S%H4672>none<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, How long <S%H3985>refuse<s%> ye to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H8451>laws<s%>?

See <S%H7200><s%>, for that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, therefore he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of two <S%H3117>days<s%>; <S%H3427>abide<s%> ye every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H376>place<s%>, let no man go <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H4478>Manna<s%>: and it was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, <S%H3836>white<s%>; and the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of it was like <S%H6838>wafers<s%> made with <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H4393>Let<s%> an <S%H6016>omerful<s%> of it be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> wherewith I <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, when I brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H6803>pot<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H6016>omerful<s%> <S%H4393>of<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H3240>therein<s%>, and lay it up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so <S%H175>Aaron<s%> laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>Testimony<s%>, to be <S%H4931>kept<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, until they <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>; they did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%>, until they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H7097>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.
Now an <S%H6016>omer<s%> is the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%>.
